name: El Paraiso
description: A new batch of Colombian coffee with notes of blueberry and violets, a gourmet and sweet coffee

name: Grenadine
description: This special Ombligon Edition from Nestor Lasso is delightful, tasting of strawberry, cherry, raspberry, and pomegranate

name: Konga #2
description: A fine coffee, representative of the Ethiopian terroir, with subtle notes of black tea, explosive kumquat and sweet honey
